text: KLBG-LP (92.5 FM, "Life At Its Best") was a low-power radio station broadcasting an educational format. Formerly licensed to Glide, Oregon, United States, the station was owned by Life At Its Best, Inc. The station's license was cancelled and the call sign deleted from the Federal Communications Commission's database on February 13, 2012. ==References== ==External links== * LBG-LP LBG-LP Category:Douglas County, Oregon Category:Three Angels Broadcasting Network radio stations Category:Radio stations disestablished in 2012 Category:Defunct radio stations in the United States Category:Defunct religious radio stations in the United States Category:2012 disestablishments in Oregon LBG-LP LBG-LP
title: KLBG-LP
